name: Tracking Elite Money Laundering
description: Following the flow of dark money through banks, hedge funds, and corporate networks.

cards.title: Understanding Money Laundering Cycles
cards.description: Breaking down the three stages of money laundering: placement, layering, and integration.
bulletpoints: Examining how illicit funds enter legitimate financial systems.
Understanding how layering obscures financial trails.
Identifying patterns of integration into legal economies.
cards.summaryText: Dissect placement, layering, and integration phases to flag laundering signatures.

cards.title: Banking Institutions and Criminal Syndicates
cards.description: Uncovering the role of major financial institutions in enabling illicit transactions.
bulletpoints: Tracing how major banks facilitate organized crime finance.
Analyzing regulatory failures in anti-money laundering (AML) enforcement.
Exposing historical cases where banks were fined for laundering illicit funds.
cards.summaryText: Expose complicit banks, scrutinize AML breakdowns, and leverage precedent-setting enforcement cases.

cards.title: Following the Money Trail
cards.description: Utilizing forensic accounting and digital tracking to expose hidden financial channels.
bulletpoints: Using blockchain analysis to track illicit cryptocurrency transactions.
Identifying patterns in high-value real estate purchases.
Tracing the use of artwork, luxury goods, and philanthropy in money laundering.
cards.summaryText: Deploy blockchain forensics, spot asset acquisition patterns, and trace luxury conduits for dark money.
